page.title: 05LOCAL NEWS
page.content: These reports were all found recently in the{local newspaper'The Cornish {Guardian'}which is printed in Bodmin every Thursday. There is{for sale}a fully modernised farmhouse with attractive gardens, lounge, dining/utility room, kitchen, bathroom and 3 bedroooms for Â£49,OOO. Cardinham chapel members handed in their talent money, which totalled Â£l4O plus a Â£25O bequest from the late Mr. Ernie Hoskin. Young Farmers Members who took part in the two charity walks for the County Appeal the Eye Laser Machine and the R.N.L.I raised more than Â£4OO. Fourteen of the{clubs'}members took part in the County walk Truro. Mr.Ayres has had{planning permission by the council for conversion of farm buildings to craft workshops refused on grounds of unsuitable services .
